contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-header-: Label for input field to set headline text
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-text-la: Label for input field to set text
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-show-ic: Label for checkbox if icon should be shown
contentdroplets-droplet-text-box-type-la: Label for dropdown to select type of text box
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-class-label: Label for input field to specify css class
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-font-size-l: Label for input field to specify font size
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-color-label: Label for input field to set color
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-orientation: Label for input field to specify vertical orientation
contentdroplets-droplet-dialog-search-pl: Placeholder label in search input field
contentdroplets-toolbar-icon-title: Title for icon in VisualEditor toolbar
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-font-size-h: {{doc-important|Do not translate "'''15px, 0.83em and 1.2rem'''".}} Help text for input field to set font size of icon
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-color-help: {{doc-important|Do not translate "'''yellows, blue and black'''".}} Help text for input field to set color of icon
contentdroplets-droplet-icon-orientation: {{doc-important|Do not translate "'''baseline, text-top, text-bottom, sub and super'''".}} Help text for input field to set vertical align value
